function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate access to mobile and smart phones, particularly in lower-and middle-income populations and certain regions","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of access to distance learning due to limited internet and technology in developing countries","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Ill-equipped healthcare systems in developing countries","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Overloaded health systems and fear of infection deter people from seeking medical care, leading to potential high mortality rates and strain on health facilities","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to perform all work remotely , in travel, agriculture, manufacturing","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 within supply chains","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of widespread transmission in public settings","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependency on the development of a vaccine","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through the analysis and synthesis of a wide range of materials from online sources","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"High number of confirmed cases and deaths in specific regions","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential presence of sars-cov-2 in the built environment","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possibility of sars-cov-2 rna fragments in sewage","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Silent reintroduction and transmission of wild poliovirus type 1 in sewage","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Applicability of wbe to sars-cov-2 for prompt detection","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of sars-cov-2 through sewage contamination and wastewater","category":"Water","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Relying on molecular methods for quantifying virus concentration in raw sewage","category":"Water","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Detection of viral rna in urban wastewaters","category":"Water","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna in influent samples from multiple wastewater treatment plants.","category":"Water","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Virus concentration below the limit of detection of the assay","category":"Water","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate thermal treatment for virus inactivation","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low sensitivity of real-time rt-qpcr assay","category":"Water","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Handling of pcr reagents and samples in a laboratory setting poses a risk of contamination and spread of infectious diseases.","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of nested pcr with multiple cycles can increase the risk of contamination and false positives.","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unamplified synthetic dna used to set up pcr conditions may introduce contamination during subsequent experiments.","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improper handling of sample rna during cdna synthesis can lead to contamination and inaccurate results.","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Handling enveloped viruses without proper chloroform treatment","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Prolonged lysis phase during rna extraction","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of nested rt-pcr assays without standardization for sars-cov-2 detection","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Raw sewage samples collected from multiple wwtps in densely populated areas.","category":"Water","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential contamination of sewage with viral rna from covid-19 patients","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Excretion of fecal-oral viruses at high concentration in sewage","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ghg emissions exacerbating global warming and climate change","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adequate infrastructure to connect opportunity zones to established centres","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overcrowding, slums, and informal settlements creating contagion hotspots.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Climate change impact on urban areas","category":"City/Metropolis","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagion hotspots in slums and informal settlements","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of climate change on vulnerable populations","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hoarding of vaccines","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of capacity for local vaccine production","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Capacity and resilience gaps across the economy","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improper disposal of non-biodegradable personal protective gears leading to environmental pollution","category":"Environment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in vaccination distribution and administration","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gaps in local production capacity and resilience across industries","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of resilience in urban food systems and value chains","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of food and waterborne disease due to climate change.","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Climate change leading to increased pest populations and impact on agricultural productivity","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Energy systems vulnerable to high temperatures and increased demand","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of climate change on insects and ecosystems.","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate healthcare infrastructure to cope with health emergencies","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of climate change and global warming on inducing disasters","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"}]}
